question:
Government plans to construct an airport in your locality. Write a letter to the authority.

-	Explain where you came to know about the news.

-	Describe the negative effects of airport construction

-	Ask to consider alternate site for airport construction

No less than 150 words
text: This is Jeevitha. I am writing in connection with the plan of constructing an airport in my locality that was mentioned in the daily newspaper on the 4th of January 2022.

I would like to inform you that my community is a residential area where we all are living in high-rise buildings. The plan to construct an airport near my city would have a significant impact on the local accommodation because of the noise pollution. Moreover, there was an old age home for senior people near the proposed plan and noise raised due to construction would disturb their peace of livings.

I would request you to look for an alternate site somewhere outside the city centre that would avoid  pollution and disturbances such as this. I would be grateful if you could consider my request. If you would like to further discuss, please call me on my mobile.
I look forward to hearing from you.
